import React from 'react' import { Button, Container, Input, Message } from 'semantic-ui-react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './Header.css' const Header = props => { return (

You are viewing tweets containing "{props.term}" word in them.

) } Header.propTypes = { term: PropTypes.string.isRequired, updateSearchTerm: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default Header
